Description: Construction Indirects (factor-based)

Description: Procurement Services (factor-based)
Notes: P = 0.02 × MAT ($570k); includes material sourcing; PO processing; expediting; receiving inspection; material documentation; per fallback typical model

Description: EPCM/Project Management (factor-based)
Notes: PM = 0.06 × (CD + CI + MAT) ($1721k); includes project management; engineering management; schedule/cost control; contract administration; stakeholder coordination; per fallback typical model

Description: Commissioning (factor-based)
Notes: COM = 0.03 × (CD + CI + MAT) ($1721k); includes pre-commissioning; performance testing per DEL-03.05 (pressure testing; CCTV; OWS performance verification; as-built survey); system acceptance; handover; per fallback typical model
